attributes.action: release information on the reasons jon venables has been recalled to prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jon Venables has been recalled to jail for unspecified reasons.  We feel it is wrong to constantly protect these killers for their crimes. We want answers and proper justice,namely the correct prison sentance in an adult jail. We feel Venables has been given a questionable chance at rehabilitation and that has proven to be undoubtedly the wrong descision. It is time to redress that gross error of justice. Jamie was just two years old.
please sign our petition thank you

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
